titleStmt.title: Natural and political observations mentioned in a following index, and made upon the bills of mortality by John Graunt ... ; with reference to the government, religion, trade, growth, ayre, diseases, and the several changes of the said city.
titleStmt.author: Graunt, John, 1620-1674.
Petty, William, Sir, 1623-1687.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Roycroft for John Martin, James Allestry, and Tho. Dicas ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed also to Sir William Petty. Cf. C.H. Hull, The economic writings of Sir William Petty. Cambridge, 1899.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
